long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: kickwire SMS allows 3CX Chat messages to be exchanged with our SMS text network. The kickwire browser extension initiates a chat session between an SMS user and the associated 3CX Click2Talk link to allow the 3CX user to continue the conversation in the native 3CX chat client interface.
